contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of October, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Superior Court’s order is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for reconsideration in light of Commonwealth v. Castro, 625 Pa. 582, 93 A.3d 818, 2014 WL 2722742 (2014). Petitioner’s Application to Remand to Trial Court is DENIED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
